Pretty Eyes

e|-3–2–0–0–0-| e|-0–0-| e|-0–0–0–0–0-| B|-3–3–1–0–0-| B|-0–1-| B|-0–0–0–0–0-| G|-0–2–2–0–0-| G|-1–2-| G|-6–4–2–1–0-| D|-0–0–2–0–0-| D|-2–2-| D|-7–5–3–2–2-| A|-2–0–0–2–2-| A|-2–0-| A|-7–5–3–2–2-| E|-3—-3–2-| E|-0–| E|-0–0–0–0–0-|when changing between E and Emin and back, hammer on the 1st fret on the G string.
